bug.short_desc: Optimize (variables) does not rename all variables

long_desc.thetext: Thomas recognized that in the data binding code was a unicode space which was not treated like every other whitespace in the source code. Therefore, the private optimizer did see a different variable and did not rename it. A new bug for checking that only the for the parser readable unicode is in the source code exists under id 1926 (http://bugzilla.qooxdoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1926).
